main event: A woman in Holtsville, Long Island, New York observed a red and yellow, basketball-shaped object in the sky on October 26, 1966.
interesting points: The object was brightly lit up and moving westward.
The witness compared the object to a blimp.
The object disappeared by moving upward out of sight.
The witness was unable to estimate the speed or distance of the object.
There were no photographs taken of the object.
sighted object: a red and yellow, basketball-shaped object
